attributes.action: Removal of fee for membership of the GTCe and obtaining CRBs for non-permanent teaching staff.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Non-permanent teaching staff (supply teachers) should not be made to pay the annual fee for the GTCe, permanent staff effectivly have this fee re-funded by the LEA and have their CRBs paid for when employed.  There is no choice in this and rather expect agencies pay for this and complicating issues, the fees should be scrapped.
